content:
TITLE: Initializing OneSignal with Vue3 using Options API - Separate Configuration
DESCRIPTION: Example showing how to initialize OneSignal by first registering the plugin, then configuring it separately. This provides better editor code-completion support.
SOURCE: https://github.com/OneSignal/onesignal-vue3/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
//main
import { createApp } from 'vue';
import OneSignalVuePlugin from '@onesignal/onesignal-vue3';

createApp(App).use(OneSignalVuePlugin).mount('#app');

// component
this.$OneSignal.init({
  appId: 'xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx',
});
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Using OneSignal with Promise-based Initialization
DESCRIPTION: Examples of how to use OneSignal's initialization with promises to perform actions after the SDK is fully loaded. Shows both async/await and promise chain approaches.
SOURCE: https://github.com/OneSignal/onesignal-vue3/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
await this.$OneSignal.init({ appId: 'xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx' });
// do other stuff
```

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
this.$OneSignal
  .init({ appId: 'xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx' })
  .then(() => {
    // do other stuff
  });
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Adding OneSignal Notification Event Listener in Vue3
DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to add an event listener for OneSignal notifications in a Vue3 application. It uses the 'change' event to log when a notification is clicked.
SOURCE: https://github.com/OneSignal/onesignal-vue3/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
this.$OneSignal.Notifications.addEventListener('change', (event) => {
  console.log('The notification was clicked!', event);
});
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Initializing OneSignal with Vue3 using Options API - Direct Configuration
DESCRIPTION: Example showing how to initialize OneSignal by passing configuration options directly to the Vue.use method. This approach configures OneSignal during the Vue application setup.
SOURCE: https://github.com/OneSignal/onesignal-vue3/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
// main
import { createApp } from 'vue';
import OneSignalVuePlugin from '@onesignal/onesignal-vue3';

createApp(App)
  .use(OneSignalVuePlugin, {
    appId: 'xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx',
  })
  .mount('#app');
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Migrating from setExternalId to login/logout in OneSignal v2
DESCRIPTION: How to update code to use the new login/logout methods instead of setExternalId for user identification in OneSignal SDK v2.
SOURCE: https://github.com/OneSignal/onesignal-vue3/blob/main/MigrationGuide.md#2025-04-18_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
OneSignal.setExternalId("myId");
```

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
OneSignal.login("myId");
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Using the User Namespace in OneSignal v2
DESCRIPTION: Example of how to use the User namespace to add an alias in the new OneSignal SDK v2 structure.
SOURCE: https://github.com/OneSignal/onesignal-vue3/blob/main/MigrationGuide.md#2025-04-18_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
OneSignal.User.addAlias("my_alias", "1234");
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Using the Notifications Namespace in OneSignal v2
DESCRIPTION: Example of how to request notification permission using the new Notifications namespace in OneSignal SDK v2.
SOURCE: https://github.com/OneSignal/onesignal-vue3/blob/main/MigrationGuide.md#2025-04-18_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
await OneSignal.Notifications.requestPermission();
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Using the Slidedown Namespace in OneSignal v2
DESCRIPTION: Example of how to prompt for push notifications using the new Slidedown namespace in OneSignal SDK v2.
SOURCE: https://github.com/OneSignal/onesignal-vue3/blob/main/MigrationGuide.md#2025-04-18_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
await OneSignal.Slidedown.promptPush();
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Opting In to Push Notifications with OneSignal Vue3 SDK
DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to use the OneSignal Vue3 SDK to opt a user into push notifications. It utilizes the PushSubscription namespace to call the optIn() method.
SOURCE: https://github.com/OneSignal/onesignal-vue3/blob/main/MigrationGuide.md#2025-04-18_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
OneSignal.User.PushSubscription.optIn();
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: OneSignal TypeScript Interface Definition
DESCRIPTION: TypeScript interface definition for the OneSignal object, showing available methods and properties. This enables type checking and autocompletion in TypeScript projects.
SOURCE: https://github.com/OneSignal/onesignal-vue3/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
interface IOneSignalOneSignal {
  Slidedown: IOneSignalSlidedown;
  Notifications: IOneSignalNotifications;
  Session: IOneSignalSession;
  User: IOneSignalUser;
  Debug: IOneSignalDebug;
  login(externalId: string, jwtToken?: string): Promise<void>;
  logout(): Promise<void>;
  init(options: IInitObject): Promise<void>;
  setConsentGiven(consent: boolean): Promise<void>;
  setConsentRequired(requiresConsent: boolean): Promise<void>;
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Alias Structure Example in OneSignal Web SDK v2
DESCRIPTION: An example showing the JSON structure of aliases in the new user-centered model, demonstrating how multiple identifiers can point to the same user.
SOURCE: https://github.com/OneSignal/onesignal-vue3/blob/main/MigrationGuide.md#2025-04-18_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
// WebSDK-specific example
{
  external_id: "1234",
  my_alias: "5678"
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Updating Service Worker Import for OneSignal v2
DESCRIPTION: How to update the service worker file importScripts reference when migrating to OneSignal SDK v2.
SOURCE: https://github.com/OneSignal/onesignal-vue3/blob/main/MigrationGuide.md#2025-04-18_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
importScripts("https://onesignal.com/sdks/OneSignalSDKWorker.js");
```

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
importScripts("https://onesignal.com/sdks/web/v16/OneSignalSDK.sw.js");
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Setting Log Level in OneSignal Vue3 SDK Debug Namespace
DESCRIPTION: This example shows how to set the log level for debugging in the OneSignal Vue3 SDK. It uses the Debug namespace to call the setLogLevel() method with a specified log level.
SOURCE: https://github.com/OneSignal/onesignal-vue3/blob/main/MigrationGuide.md#2025-04-18_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
OneSignal.Debug.setLogLevel("trace");
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing OneSignal Vue3 Package with npm
DESCRIPTION: Command to install the OneSignal Vue3 integration package using npm package manager.
SOURCE: https://github.com/OneSignal/onesignal-vue3/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm install --save @onesignal/onesignal-vue3
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing OneSignal Vue3 Package with Yarn
DESCRIPTION: Command to install the OneSignal Vue3 integration package using Yarn package manager.
SOURCE: https://github.com/OneSignal/onesignal-vue3/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
yarn add @onesignal/onesignal-vue3
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Dependencies for Vue 3 Project
DESCRIPTION: Installs all necessary dependencies for the Vue 3 project using npm.
SOURCE: https://github.com/OneSignal/onesignal-vue3/blob/main/example/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
npm install
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Vue 3 Development Server
DESCRIPTION: Compiles and hot-reloads the Vue 3 application for development purposes.
SOURCE: https://github.com/OneSignal/onesignal-vue3/blob/main/example/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
npm run serve
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building Vue 3 Project for Production
DESCRIPTION: Compiles and minifies the Vue 3 application for production deployment.
SOURCE: https://github.com/OneSignal/onesignal-vue3/blob/main/example/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
npm run build
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Linting Vue 3 Project Files
DESCRIPTION: Runs the linter to check and fix code style issues in the Vue 3 project files.
SOURCE: https://github.com/OneSignal/onesignal-vue3/blob/main/example/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
npm run lint
```
